definition: fast (in several religions)/Ramadan (Islam)/see also 齋月|斋月[Zhai1 yue4]
to confer/to grant/to bestow a title/to seal/classifier for sealed objects, esp. letters
to fast or abstain from meat, wine etc/vegetarian diet/study room/building/to give alms (to a monk)

sentences.english: Noora's younger sister Nadia is trying to start fasting this Ramadan.
sentences.chinese: 努勒的妹妹納迪試着在今年齋月開始封齋。

sentences.english: Iftar: Ending of the fast immediately after sunset.
sentences.chinese: 在日落時，結束一天的封齋。

sentences.english: According to Islamic rules, boys under 9 do not need to fast.
sentences.chinese: 規定，9歲以下的男孩因爲未成年而不用封齋。
